column4: I have the gOS instaled on another PC, not the walmart $200..  :)
willis... everytime i try to install Ubuntu it freezes.. gOS, based on Ubuntu, does not freeze
i had an odd issue like that once.. Kubuntu/Ubuntu locked up the pc. but xubuntu worked.. I tend to use the alternative cd's it tends to work better then the live cds
OpenGEU is the new name for  that 'geubuntu' varient. :) i rember they changed names recently.   I grabbed the latest live cd from them last week.
